import { IMenuItem } from "./menu-item";
 
export interface IMenuService {
    handleItemClick: (event:MouseEvent, item: IMenuItem) => void;
}
 
export class MenuService implements IMenuService {
    public handleItemClick = (event:MouseEvent, item: IMenuItem):void => {
        switch (item.itemType) {
            case "option":
                event.stopPropagation();
                break;
            case "link":
                // do not redirect when an item is disabled
                if (item.disabled) {
                    event.preventDefault();
                }
                break;
            case "action":
                // do not perform an action when an item is disabled
                if (!item.disabled) {
                    item.action(item.params);
                }
                break;
            default:
                break;
        }
    };
}
